text:
<http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/blogspot/hsDu/~3/5PmtdmfneV8/barcode-detection-in-google-play.html|Barcode Detection in Google Play services>
Posted by <https://plus.google.com/+LaurenceMoroney/posts|Laurence Moroney>, Developer Advocate

With the <http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2015/08/google-play-services-78-lets-see-whats.html|release of Google Play services 7.8> we’re excited to announce that we’ve added new Mobile Vision APIs which provides the Barcode Scanner API to read and decode a myriad of different barcode types quickly, easily and locally. 

Barcode detection
Classes for detecting and...

<http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/blogspot/hsDu/~3/Z1Wxc-HBZN0/play-games-loot-drop-for-developers.html|Play Games Loot Drop for Developers>
Posted by Ben Frenkel, Product Manager Google Play Games 

Launched last March, <http://android-developers.blogspot.com/2015/03/power-great-gaming-with-new-analytics.html|Player Analytics> is already becoming an important tool for many game developers, helping them to manage their games businesses and optimize in-game player behavior. Today we’re expanding Player Analytics with two new analytics reports that give you better visibility into time-based player activity and custom...
